Package name.livitski.tools.xml.staxform

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XMLEventProcessor
    A simple contract for user-defined transformations of XML events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTransformer
    Implements common methods required from custom XML transformers.
    DefaultErrorListener
    The default ErrorListener that reports all warnings and errors to System.err and does not throw any exceptions.
    SourceLocatorForLocation
    Wraps a Location object into a SourceLocator.
    XMLEventTransformer
    Implements basic functions of a Transformer by delegating to a user-defined XMLEventProcessor.
